dmca.title: gtgstudios.com cease and desist notice
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, February 06, 2007 4:15 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2950525C] gtgstudios.com cease and desist notice ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. gtgstudios.com cease and desist notice Added by system at Tuesday, Feb 6 2007 09:55 am X-MailFrom: callahanj@firemtn.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Feb 6 09:55:08 2007 Received: (qmail 2068 invoked by alias); 6 Feb 2007 15:55:08 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 2065 invoked from network); 6 Feb 2007 15:55:07 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 6 Feb 2007 15:55:07 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 6 Feb 2007 09:55:07 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 06 Feb 2007 09:55:07 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from callahanj@firemtn.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HESew-0001NZ-SA for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 06 Feb 2007 09:55:07 -0600 Received: from mailserv.firemtn.com ([68.189.16.6]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from callahanj@firemtn.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HESek-000Iec-CR for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 06 Feb 2007 09:54:54 -0600 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C74A07.205A5AC3"; type="multipart/alternative" Subject: gtgstudios.com cease and desist notice Date: Tue, 6 Feb 2007 07:54:47 -0800 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: gtgstudios.com cease and desist notice Thread-Index: AcdKByBkezlAoirMQN6wPOAjoLJItw== From: "Jamie Callahan" To: Cc: , , "Jamie Callahan" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 06 Feb 2007 15:55:07.0174 (UTC) FILETIME=[2C4BCC60:01C74A07] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) One Fire Mountain Way Grants Pass, OR 97526 February 6, 2007 Website: http://www.gtgstudios.com/fire-mountain-gems/2007/02/fire-mountain-gems- fire-blankets-escape-ladders-heat-and-duct.php Oneandone gtgstudios.com 701 Lee Road, Suite 300 Chesterbrook, PA 19087 IP Address: 74.52.133.18 RE: Cease and Desist Dear Sir or Madam, It has come to our attention that you may be using the property of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc, including, but not limited to, the Fire Mountain Gems and Beads name, logo, website images and/or text, printed materials, domain names confusingly similar to the trademarks or service marks of, without the express written approval of the management of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads. Further, we understand that you may be alluding to (either in an express or implied manner) a business relationship with Fire Mountain Gems and Beads, other than that of a typical Fire Mountain Gems and Beads customer. This letter is issued to you as a direct order to cease and desist immediately any of the following practices: * The registration, trafficking in, or use of a domain name that is identical or confusing similar to a trademark or service mark of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc, a famous mark at the time of the registration of the domain name, or dilutive of a famous trademark or service mark of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc, a famous mark at the time of the registration of the domain name, without regard to the goods or services of the parties, with the bad-faith intent to profit from the goodwill of a mark that is the property of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc. (commonly known as "cyberpiracy" and "cybersquatting") * The unauthorized use of the Fire Mountain Gems and Beads trademarks, service marks, logo, brand names, website and/or catalog images and text, and other intellectual property, online or offline that: a. Results in consumer fraud and public confusion as to the true source or sponsorship of goods and services offered by Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc. b. Impairs the electronic commerce of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc c. Deprives Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc of substantial revenues and consumer goodwill * The issuance of any statements or references (both written and oral) to the existence of a partnership or commercial relationship with Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc. Fire Mountain Gems and Beads does not allow the practices listed above without the express written approval of the management of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc, which has not been granted to you. We can and will enforce existing trademark, copyright infringement and other intellectual property laws to the fullest extent allowed, if you do not cease and desist in any of the these practices immediately. Thank you for your expected prompt compliance with the requirements of this letter. Sincerely, Jamie Callahan Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Phone: (541) 956-8242 MIME element (text/html)

One Fire Mountain Way

Grants Pass, OR 97526

 

February 6, 2007

 

Website:

http://www.gtgstudios.com/fire-mountain-gems/2007/02/fire-mountai n-gems-fire-blankets-escape-ladders-heat-and-duct.php 

Oneandone
gtgstudios.com
701 Lee Road, Suite
300
Chesterbrook, PA
19087
IP Address: 74.52.133.18!
  

RE:  Cease and Desist

 

Dear Sir or Madam,

 

It has come to our attention that you may be using the property of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc, including, but not limited to, the Fire Mountain Gems and Beads name, logo, website images and/or text, printed materials, domain names confusingly similar to the trademarks or service marks of, without the express written approval of the management of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads. Further, we understand that you may be alluding to (either in an express or implied manner) a business relationship with Fire Mountain Gems and Beads, other than that of a typical Fire Mountain Gems and Beads customer.

 

This letter is issued to you as a direct order to cease and desist immediately any of the following practices:

 

  • The registration, trafficking in, or use of a domain name that is identical or confusing similar to a trademark or service mark of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc, a famous mark at the time of the registration of the domain name, or dilutive of a famous trademark or service mark of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc, a famous mark at the time of the registration of the domain name, without regard to the goods or services of the parties, with the bad-faith intent to profit from the goodwill of a mark that is the property of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc. (commonly known as “cyberpiracy” and “cybersquatting”)

 

  • The unauthorized use of the Fire Mountain Gems and Beads trademarks, service marks, logo, brand names, website and/or catalog images and text, and other intellectual property, online or offline that:

 

a.       Results in consumer fraud and public confusion as to the true source or sponsorship of goods and services offered by Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc.

 

b.       Impairs the electronic commerce of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc

 

c.       Deprives Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc of substantial revenues and consumer goodwill

 

  • The issuance of any statements or references (both written and oral) to the existence of a partnership or commercial relationship with Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc.

 

Fire Mountain Gems and Beads does not allow the practices listed above without the express written approval of the management of Fire Mountain Gems and Beads Inc, which has not been granted to you. We can and will enforce existing trademark, copyright infringement and other intellectual property laws to the fullest extent allowed, if you do not cease and desist in any of the these practices immediately.

 

Thank you for your expected prompt compliance with the requirements of this letter.

 

 

Sincerely,

 

 

Jamie Callahan

Fire Mountain Gems and Beads

Phone: (541) 956-8242
